org.eclipse.january.dataset

Class Slice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.january.dataset.Slice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class Slice
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Serializable
    Class to represent a slice through a single dimension of a multi-dimensional dataset. A slice comprises a starting position, a stopping position (not included) and a stepping size.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        stop - if null, then default to bound
        step - if null, then default to 1

      • flip

        public Slice flip()
        Flip slice direction so slice begins at previous end point, steps in the opposite direction, and finishes at the previous start point .

        Note the stop value may not be preserved across two flips
